titleStmt.title: Orders, set down by the Lord Provost, bailiffs, and Council of Edinburgh, to be observed by the constables thereof, in discharge of their offices within this burgh, and liberties of the same.
titleStmt.author: Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Swintoun, one of His Majestie's Printers,

notesStmt.note: Arms of the city of Edinburgh at head of text.
